name: Decayed Decoy
description: Grant +[effect0.status0.power] stack of [corruptpoison] each time it is applied.
relicLoreTooltips: I like to think that, over time, I’ve become more empathetic to decisions made that I may not make myself. The Spine Chief’s decision to keep the Wurmkin hidden for all these years is one of those decisions — one I would not make, but I understand. Empathy, however, does not require respect.
